headline: Will KMB's Powering Care Strategy & Other Efforts Drive Growth?
summary: Kimberly-Clark powers growth through innovation, premiumization and its transformative Powering Care strategy.

headline: Did Kimberly-Clark’s (KMB) $28.7M Global Health Initiative Just Shift Its Investment Narrative?
summary: Kimberly-Clark announced a three-year, US$28.7 million commitment through its Foundation to expand menstrual and maternal care programs in partnership with organizations such as Baby2Baby, Plan International, Project HOPE, and UNICEF, aiming to reach approximately 24 million women and girls across seven countries. This philanthropic initiative stands out for its global scope and targeted support for essential health needs, highlighting a unique aspect of Kimberly-Clark’s business beyond...

headline: Kimberly-Clark Launches Enhanced Global Partnerships To Advance Essential Care for 24 Million Women and Girls
summary: DALLAS, TX / ACCESS Newswire / October 9, 2025 /Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB) is deepening its commitment to advancing essential care for women and girls through four enhanced strategic, charitable partnerships. Through new programs with ...
